name: Power Of The Hutt
Lore: 'Jabba runs his organization out of a palace built around a B''omarr monastery. His fortress near the border of the western Dune Sea is safe from enemies in Mos Eisley.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Once during each of your turns, may deploy one Boelo, Bib, Ephant Mon, Jabba''s Sail Barge, Jabba''s Space Cruiser, or Hutt Influence from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Also, your aliens aboard Jabba''s Sail Barge are immune to attrition < 6. (Immune to Alter.)',
